CustomField.description:
This is required for rejected claims only. This field will contain the text from the selected reject reason. Pertains only to claims with “Claims outcome” = R. all approved claims would be blank for this field. Values should represent the Integrichain program specific reject reasons that reside on our processing system. Approved claims will not have a value assigned to this field.
Expected values: No patient responsibility, No eligible charges, Maximum benefit exceeded, DOS outside eligibility period, Timely filing, Missing claim form/check request form, Government payer, Missing EOB, Duplicate claim, Missing patient receipt, Primary payer denial, Insurance mismatch, Other
CustomField.label: Rejected Reason
